main_definition: Rocks refers to a solid mineral material forming part of the surface of the Earth, the moon, or other similar bodies.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A large stone on the ground used for sitting or as an object in nature
meanings_and_examples.example: She sat down on a big rock to rest.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be very good at something and able to do it well without any problems
meanings_and_examples.example: His guitar skills have really rocks. He can play almost anything flawlessly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An indication or evidence of something, often used informally in the phrase 'there are some serious rocks that we need to address'
meanings_and_examples.example: There are a few major issues with this project; there are some serious rocks to work out.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To endure or survive without being affected by something difficult or unpleasant
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite the challenging circumstances, they managed to keep going and rocked it through adversity.
